scripts.clean-init: rm -fr xe && rm -fr xeira.json && cp -f package.json.original package.json
scripts.x-reset: npm run --silent clean-init && rm -fr node_modules && rm -fr package-lock.json
scripts.make_link: mkdir -p node_modules && cd node_modules && rm -fr xeira && ln -fs ../../../../ xeira
scripts.x-prepare: npm run --silent x-reset && npm i && npm run --silent make_link
scripts.x-init: npm run --silent clean-init && mkdir xe && node ../../../bin/xeira.mjs init package both ./src/index.js true false eslint ./lib babel ./dist rollup ./test auto rollup && cp xeira.json ./xe/xeira.json && cp package.json ./xe/package.json
scripts.x-run: npm run --silent x-init && npm run --silent x-compare
